name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Textero AI: Your Personal AI-Powered Writing & Research Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Textero is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps you create high-quality content faster and easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Textero is an AI Writer Chrome extension that helps you create professional content right in the browser. Keep your grammar in check, support the originality of your work with AI and plagiarism detection, paraphrase any text to say exactly what you mean, and conduct quality research fast. Get start-to-finish writing assistance with our AI Essay Writer!

Free access to Textero’s versatile toolbox:

✒️ Grammar Checker: immediately set high standards with pristine grammar, spelling, and punctuation. Get stylistic improvement suggestions for better readability.
📋 AI Summarizer: save time and capture the essence of long papers in a handy bullet point format. Preserve the quality of your research and don’t miss any key details.
🔃 Paraphraser: rework and humanize your text while keeping its original meaning intact. Go beyond synonyms and enjoy contextual-based paraphrasing.
✅ Essay Grader: pinpoint areas for improvement before turning your essay in or get through multiple student works fast while preserving the quality of your feedback.
⚠️ Plagiarism Checker: detect any accidentally copied or generatively rephrased content for proper citation to meet the highest academic standards.
🤖 AI Detector: reveal generated text from popular and new AI models like ChatGPT, GPT-4, Bard, Google-Gemini, Bing, Claude, LLaMa, and others.

⚙️ How do you get started working with our writer extension?

Download the Textero AI Writer extension from the Chrome Web Store and allow the browser to add it. Activate the tool window by opening the Extensions tab (click the puzzle piece icon in the upper right corner) and begin your professional writing journey — it’s that easy!

Who will benefit from working with our AI writing extension?

🧑‍🎓 Students can improve their essays on every level, from grammar and readability to originality.
📚 Writers can avoid writer’s block, preserve authenticity, and clean up their manuscripts.
👔 Professionals can quality-control and summarize their paperwork and correspondence.
🧑‍🏫 Educators can grade faster and catch academic dishonesty to uphold high classroom standards.  
🧑‍🔬 Researchers can keep up with the latest developments in their field for academic integrity.
🤳🏻 Content creators can deliver clear and original content plans, scripts, and captions.

Write like a pro with Textero!

✅ Multilingual: manage your writing in up to 9 languages, including English, Spanish, and German.
✅ Seamless workflow: effortlessly move through the writing stages from finding an essay topic to writing to editing to proofreading — with our support.
✅ All tools in one place: Essay Checker, Grammar Check, Essay Paraphraser, Text Summarizer, and more! No more jumping tabs.
✅ Constant updates: we continue to improve our features to improve user experience and give you better results.

🎁 Get high-quality service with our basic features…

➤ Dependable grammar check
➤ 2 paraphrasing modes
➤ 2 summary format options
➤ Plagiarism and AI detection with no false positives
➤ Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, RTF, ODT, and TXT file formats for upload

…or…

🏆 …upgrade to Pro or Unlimited on our site and unlock your full potential!

➤ Advanced grammar check
➤ Additional paraphrasing and summarizing modes 
➤ Detailed breakdowns of any AI-generated or plagiarized content
➤ Free Essay Writer, context-aware AI writer-and-editor for papers up to 20K words
➤ AI Research Assistant for clear and simple access to and handling of academic sources

🔒 Privacy and Data

Your privacy is critically important to Textero. We do not pass your personal data to third parties, and we never will. We will always provide a detailed explanation of what data we ask from you and why. We aim for full transparency on how we gather, use, and share your personal data. Read our full Privacy Policy: https://textero.io/privacy-policy. Get acquainted with our Terms and Conditions: https://textero.io/terms-conditions.
